pages.title: Troubleshooting based on the status LED

buttons.title: The status LED is off
The status LED blinking
buttons.detail: Blinking is where the color turns on and off without dimming.

buttons.title: The status LED breathing
buttons.detail: Breathing is where the color slowly fades in and out.

buttons.title: The status LED going crazy, showing rainbow of colors
The blue LED next to pin D7 is on, dimly
Use Device Restore to replace the device firmware

pages.title: Status LED breathing
pages.description: Breathing (slowly fading in an out) is typically a normal operating mode. The color indicates which connectivity mode the device is in.

buttons.title: Breathing cyan (light blue, normal operating mode)
Breathing green (network connected, no cloud)
Breathing magenta (red and blue at the same time, safe mode)
